attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sir,
Drunkeness is a self inflicted condition,and as such should NOT be funded from the public purse.I would petition that BINGE DRINKERS who require hospital treatment should be made to contribute to their treatment,
if they can afford to drink in excess they can surely pay for their 'irresponsibility'. Motorists pay  when they break the law,eg parking and receive a fixed penalty.Binge drinkers could also have a fixed penalty posted to them.
